message: This is a great opportunity to get a product at a steal! It's only $100, which is 50% off the average market price. I'm sure you'll love it!

Thank you for the offer, Alice, but based on the outcome of the last purchase, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity to avoid potential disappointment.
